issue.title: [CF 1429] LUA errors breaking TMW
issue.body:
This has been happening to me since 7.2.5. Didnt want to post a bug until I got more data. It seems to me like it's happening when using teleportation (eg - hearthstones), and also sometimes when transitioning into the M+ timer. Most condition icons stop working and buff trackers' timers will always show 0. Castbars will not have spell details.

 

I caught the following LUA error. Hope it helps:

 

``` 30x [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: script ran too long [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5> (tail call): ? TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-8.4.0.lua:2651: in function `UpdateNormally' TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-8.4.0.lua:2783: in function `Update' TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-8.4.0.lua:2791: in function `?' ...s\Broker_Currency\libs\AceTimer-3.0\AceTimer-3.0-17.lua:53: in function <...s\Broker_Currency\libs\AceTimer-3.0\AceTimer-3.0.lua:48> Locals: func = defined @TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Group.lua:424 (*temporary) = true (*temporary) = "script ran too long" method = defined @TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:811 arg1 = TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon76 { 0 = group = TellMeWhen_Group5 { } ComponentsLookup = ```
``` { } Update_Method = "auto" EventHandlersSet ={ } Modules ={ } attributes ={ } ID = 76 Name = "" GUID = "" Enabled = false Type = "" NextUpdateTime = 0 TempGUID = "TMW:icon:1PNc6eqD6_Bz" UnitConditions ={ } typeData ={ } position ={ } lmbButtonData ={ } Events ={ } SettingsPerView ={ } viewData ={ } Conditions ={ } Components ={ } States ={ } } xpcall = defined =[C]:-1 call = defined safecall Dispatcher[1]:3 eh = defined @TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:457 ```

> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg | Imported from CurseForge issue #1429 | Raw
